title: Budget 2022 sets tone for establishing India as global tech innovation hub, says NASSCOM - Firstpost
content: Budget 2022 sets tone for establishing India as global tech innovation hub, says NASSCOM  Firstpost
description: 'The government's sharp focus on technology-enabled development and aligned investments in key sectors like healthcare, fintech, R&D, start-ups and agriculture is a testament to India's technology prowess,' NASCOMM said
